scripts.build: cds build && rimraf resources mta_archives && mbt build --mtar archive -m=verbose -j=8
scripts.deploy-qa: node scripts/qa-deploy-config.js && npm run build && npm run deploy && node scripts/reset-deploy-config.js
scripts.deploy:card-qa: node scripts/qa-ui-deploy-config.js && npm run build:card && npm run deploy:card && node scripts/reset-ui-deploy-config.js
scripts.deploy:ui-qa: node scripts/qa-ui-deploy-config.js && npm run build:ui && npm run deploy:ui && node scripts/reset-ui-deploy-config.js
scripts.app:mock: npm run set-mock && npm run copy-cdsrc:mock && cds bind --exec -- npm run start-local --prefix approuter
scripts.app:xsuaa: npm run set-xsuaa && npm run copy-cdsrc:xsuaa && cds bind --exec -- npm run start-local --prefix approuter
scripts.app:server: npm run copy-cdsrc:xsuaa && rimraf approuter/local/default-env.json && cds bind --exec -- npm run start-local --prefix approuter
scripts.cap:mock: npm run copy-cdsrc:mock && cds watch --profile hybrid
scripts.cap:xsuaa: npm run copy-cdsrc:xsuaa && cds watch --profile hybrid
scripts.cap: npm run copy-cdsrc:xsuaa && cds watch --profile hybrid
scripts.ui5-cfpush: sh -c 'npm run build:cf --prefix app/$1 && rimraf app/$1/dist/*.zip && copyfiles -f app/$1/xs-app.json app/$1/dist/ && cf html5-push -redeploy --prefix app/$1/dist'
